name: Jay Izso
text: I would give them a -5 if I could.  I live 1.1 miles away from this store.  It took exactly 1 hour and 20 minutes to get the pizza delivered.  It took 25 minutes just sitting in "quality control".  When it arrived it was cold, the cheese …More

name: David Daughton
text: While they have increased their speed some.   The quality is still well below average.  Check out how little hamburger they added to our pizza.  This looks like one of those 1.00 frozen pizzas.

name: Matt Random
text: I received good service here. The assistant manager Daniel did a really good job in making sure that I was satisfied. Great job Daniel!

name: Kellilyn Rocheleau
text: This location is horrible. First time I ordered, there wasn’t any buffalo sauce on my buffalo chicken pizza, tried to give them another chance because things happen, second time I ordered, I placed my order and then they called me to cancel …More

name: Chase Eliason
text: After leaving "Detailed Notes" l watched my food labeled as delivered and the delivery driver, on the app, drive away. Yet my food wasn't at my apartment. I walked around my building and then the next and found sauce cups on the ground in …More

name: Jesus Cedeño
text: Ok pizza, wings are a joke lol. Little tiny ones but weren’t that bad..

name: Kevin Porter
text: The folks that work at this Domino’s really take pride in their work, and it shows. Even a simple pepperoni and pineapple looks like a work of art.

name: Kyle Merritt
text: Quality is generally fine, but on several occasions it’s taken 1 hour+ to receive my food. I understand that places get busy but when it takes 2-3 times the “estimated delivery time” On several occasions it becomes a significant source of frustration

name: James Mackintosh
text: Expectations are admittedly low for a fast food pizza place, but the food is always great and everyone that works here is friendly!  They're fast too.  Great store.

name: Sara Park
text: Today, I went to Domino's Pizza on Leesville road. There were 6 employees in the small store but only two of them were wearing their masks and four of them didn't wear mask. They were talking and laughing without masks. Two of them were …More

name: Erin
text: This location is hit or miss. It was good about a year or so ago (pizza was delivered in 30 mins it was insanely fast) but lately it's been pretty bad. A couple months ago I placed an order that took an hour and a half so the manager (didnt …More

name: Jason Persaud
text: We rolled into the parking lot at the same time as another customer. They got to order but we were told that takeout stops at 10. Which is reasonable, but they do delivery until 12. Such an answer would have been acceptable had they not hooked up another customer with a whole order and decided to not answer the phone when we called.

name: Jill Cartwright
text: Placed a very large pizza order for a team celebration. Email confirmation told me it would take up to 25 minutes to deliver an order for 11:45am, so I was worried when my order hadn't been started at 10:56.  I called just to make sure that …More

name: Henry Chin
text: This is a reliable location.Good service! Always on time! Thank you for being there and working through all of this craziness!

name: Peter Yun
text: Used to be good but not sure what happened to this store. The guys at the front are really slow. Maybe a new person?  Ordered promised at 5:50pm not even ready at after 6pm. Still awaiting...  (6:09pm) now they are saying we have to start …More

name: Nadine Mann
text: Excellent customer service and great pizza.

name: Customer Service - The Foreign Service Inc.
text: In a time where the term "fast food" is becoming more of a curse, the crew at this Domino's is the complete opposite. They have never failed to deliver the best product, in the best condition, in the least time, hands down. Congratulations to all involved! We do appreciate what you do.

name: Meena Udeshi-Shaw
text: This is the best Domino's around! They are quick to deliver, I've never had an incorrect order and they take the time to do things right! Instead of rushing from place to place like most companies I know. There is always a friendly face to …More

name: Mikel Shearer
text: great pizza at a good price.  fast delivery.

name: Barbara Green
text: Ordered. Ham and cheese pizza and a pepperoni and cheese is what we received. They told my husband that Marinara sauce comes with the cheese bread and of course there was none in the box. I called and was told they don’t put sauce in it anymore. Worst pizza place. I am done with them.

name: Ryan Swan
text: Best in town. I'm coming back!

name: Pat Cagno
text: Placed an on line order for delivery,  tracker showed pizza being prepped,  decided since I was heading home after picking up my grandkids,  I would just drop by and pick it up. Must have been at least 10-15 minutes later. Stopped to pick …More

name: JogaArts
text: Awful pizza and awful employees, avoid this place.  They will take 2+ hours to deliver the food.

name: Andy Miller
text: Quick, great, tastes great. Toppings are distributed well and generously, never dry. Only caveat is they indicate on the app that the pizza is done and picked up almost simultaneously... kinda weird.

name: Emilio Gonzalez
text: Was a really good service, the pizzas was good. Thank you

name: Rebecca O'Sullivan
text: Waited two hours for delivery. No one would answer the phone at the store. Finally drove to the store to cancel the order and the store was full of other people who never got their pizza.

name: Peter
text: I've only ordered delivery here, and it's been consistently great! Dominos has really stepped up their gane when it comes to quality, while still having the great deals along with it. Delivery quality also very good, order is always …More

name: K Massey
text: Ridiculous! I ordered a medium pizza at 6:31pm tonight, and as of 8:22pm right now, the order is still in the prep stage per the online tracker.  Been on hold on the phone now for 18 minutes waiting to talk to someone about when I can get …More

name: A Murphy
text: Terrible experience at this establishment. Never answered the phone as I checked on my order (which wasn’t even in the oven by the time I arrived) an hour later. Ended up canceling the order because of the long wait and lack of customer service.

name: Niko B
text: This is the BEST dominos I've ever eaten at. Fresh hot pizza, amazing drink options. I'd give it a 10 star if I could. …More

name: D Douglas
text: Great service and great people.

name: Moose Garvey
text: Always quick(usually quicker than expected) for both pick up and delivery. Order is always accurate and staff is kind. …More

name: Ryan Avett
text: Waited for 30 minutes for a pizza that was already sitting on the counter the whole time. The clerk at the front did not look for it when I signed the receipt and did not once call out waiting pizzas the whole time I was there.  While in …More

name: Jess Guthartz
text: Awful. they delivered raw cheesy bread the last time and tonight's order was supposed to be 2 pizzas. Delivery driver just showed up after an hour and a half with 1 pizza that wasn't even ours. We told her no thanks cancel the order. We will never use this location again.

name: Rick Piranha
text: This ie the best Domino's location my experience as a repeat customer is been excellent friendly staff, attentive. No issue

name: Stacey Janet
text: The 7.99$ take out large pizza is a great deal for a family! The pizza is good and the employees are helpful and upbeat.

name: Shekita Hagans
text: I love this place!!! It's nice that I have a Dominos close to where I work. The app is amazing. Love getting points to earn my free pizza.

name: Vidhur Thoutireddy
text: I came here often and the pizza is consistent and fast. Also the prices are great as well.

name: KERRBEAR
text: Ordered a large pan tossed 3 topping pizza with extra cheeze, Italian sausage & pepperoni. The price was affordable but my pizza was wrong. It had extra cheeze, black olives & pepperoni. I had to pick off the black olives. So, I paid for 3 …More

name: Mick Lane
text: On February 14th we made an order for delivery.  It took nearly two hours to get here. During the wait my wife called for an update and the person answering the phone said our order was out for delivery and that he would add a credit for a …More

name: Lisa Potter
text: Good deals!

name: Matthew Goss
text:
Overall quality is what you would expect from a Domino’s.

Disappointed when I picked up my order because they were playing inappropriate music very loud inside. Employees were dancing and rapping to the music. Not professional.

name: Christine Carroll
text: This Dominos is always awesome    -Christine

name: Jonnamae Soliman
text: Poor service! It takes forever to deliver the food.

name: Sakz Norton
text: We made an order over the phone for delivery. They sent one pizza we didn’t order and didn’t send a pizza or wings we did order.  When we called back they said the only way they’d bring the items we ordered but didn’t receive was if we …More

name: Don Fisher
text: Mushroom hoagie ftw.  Pizza not so bad.

name: Kyle Arbutina
text: Would not deliver, called them and we’re super rude. Late 30 minutes just to end up canceling.

name: Jeffrey Barrus
text: Pizza app and friendly delivery staff make Dominos the go to for quick delicious pizza.

name: Kathy Pollard
text: Placed order at 6:30, still waiting for delivery at 8:05 and their phone just rings busy continuously so you can't get any update as to why their is a delay. It is 8:20 and we had to go get it ourselves.  Very disappointed in lack of service - just said sorry.

name: Rachell Wallace
text: This Domino's is awesome! I order from here all the time (literally like 2 or 3 times a week), they have never messed up a single order. Their delivery drivers are always prompt and very courteous. I will continue to order from this place 2 or 3 times a week. Maybe more than that.

name: Natalie D
text: we order every wed for delivery and we just love y'all!!!

name: Derek Tarrant
text: Always on time. Always delicious. Love the Brooklyn style pizza!

name: Matt chef
text: Quick and tastes good

name: Antonio Gutierrez
text: Good pizza for the price.

name: OLE AZU
text: I love the entire team members and management as well as all the things that we do tomake our store  #7431 a fun place to work. Dsenator Ole, l approved this message.

name: Josh Sheffield
text: I ordered pizza and wings in the app. The address for this store is wrong and there is no phone number listed. My pizza was cold and my wings were soggy by the time I figured out where to go. I told the manager on duty. He acknowledged the …More

name: Greg Bunderlin
text: Came in for a carry-out yesterday and the pizza was disgusting. Not only was the pizza gross, but the girl who took my order had a bad attitude. I will not be coming back nor will I recommend this Dominos to anyone!

name: Martha Choe
text: Always a great experience at my local Leesville Dominos! Thank you, everyone, for doing a great job!

name: Julie White
text: Fresh, hot, fast and delicious. No complaints. Love the mobile app.

name: Dave Lupien
text: I have to hand it to this store...they never fail to put out delicious food no matter what we order.  Tonight's pie was no exception.  As a matter of fact, it was so good and perfectly cooked, that it finally prompted me to give them a …More

name: Eric Leicht
text: Never once have I had an issue with the Leesville/Strickland rd location regardless if it's delivery or carryout. They have always been top notch with customer service and the quality of their pizza.

name: Favor Asabor
text: Pizza was messy, the pasta was splattered everywhere on the box and the chicken was missing pieces. Don't recommend at all

name: Jim Rupp
text: Food is ALWAYS hot and properly prepared and staff is exceptionally friendly and courteous.

name: Chip Nicol
text: Good value, consistent quality, quick delivery, convenient location for pickup.

name: Dwayne Sutton
text: My favorite pizza place

name: Sawyer Lewis
text: They got my order wrong, but fixed it up quickly and politely.

name: PSUDuke PSUDuke
text: My teenage daughter ordered.  I did not know until after the order was placed.  $15 for a medium pizza with extra cheese.  That price is a total ripoff. No offer to get 2 for $5.99.    I will never, ever buy another Domino's pizza.

name: First in Freedom
text: Not hot, small amount of toppings, not evenly spread

text: Not good

text: Usually good...but driver had the wrong order.  Took :45 min to bring the right order....no discount, no loyalty, no more business from me.

name: Vanitee Furn
text: Did not answer the phone.  Had plans to order a pizza, their hours were until midnight on Saturday nights.  Terrible customer service!  If I continued to call I can't help but wonder how the quality of the pizza would be so I went else where...
